column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My girlfriend and I started with the Malnati's salad...she said it was one of the best she's tried and I highly agree. We also ordered the stuffed spinach bread to start
column2: and it was equally incredible. The pizza was of course the main attraction
column3: and it lived up to every high expectation. With a tall glass of soda
column4: nothing in a long time has tasted so good. The Malnati Chicago Classic pizza is pure decadence...one slice was very filling.
